name: A hypothetical dream.
description:
If I weren't a father, husband, brother or son.
If I didn't depend on my work.
If I didn't have more time to waste.
If I didn't have ways to fight.
If I hadn't done my part.
If I wasn't afraid.

I would never miss this scam.
I would never hesitate to hurt you.
I would never let you get away.
I would never be sorry.
I would never be ashamed.

I would be extremely proud.
I would have operated on your eyes.
I would have stained my knife.
I would have waved my flag.
I would have carved your forehead.

It would end this farce.
It would return  earth to its true form.
It would make you pay for 500,000 lives.
It would return the pride of being Brazilian.

If I had a dream, he wouldn't be alive.

5696x8188 - 08SET2021 - VULGODR
